languages.text: {n}Абеляр рассеянно проводит рукой по волосам.{/n} "Ну и дела... Было время, когда я, увидев Канистру в гробу, пустился бы в пляс. И это не для красного словца сказано! Клянусь Троном, сплясал бы на месте! А теперь... не знаю. Не будешь уже прямо из-под носа крейсера в варп сигать, да, старый зверь? Кто б мог подумать, что я буду тебя хоронить..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр рассеянно проводит рукой по волосам.{/n} "Ну и дела... Было время, когда я, увидев Канистру в гробу, пустился бы в пляс. И это не для красного словца сказано! Клянусь Троном, сплясал бы на месте! А теперь... не знаю. Не будешь уже прямо из-под носа крейсера в варп сигать, да, старый зверь? Кто б мог подумать, что я буду тебя хоронить..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр рассеянно проводит рукой по волосам.{/n} "Ну и дела... Было время, когда я, увидев Канистру в гробу, пустился бы в пляс. И это не для красного словца сказано! Клянусь Троном, сплясал бы на месте! А теперь... не знаю. Не будешь уже прямо из-под носа крейсера в варп сигать, да, старый зверь? Кто б мог подумать, что я буду тебя хоронить..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard runs his hand over his hair absentmindedly.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. And I'm not being figurative! I swear by the Throne, I would have danced a jig there and then! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought that I would come to your funeral..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德心不在焉地捋了捋头发。{/n}“是啊，是啊……换做以前，如果我亲眼看到‘油罐’躺在棺材里，我恐怕会高兴得跳起舞来，是真的跳起舞来！黄金王座在上，我会在他的葬礼上当场来一段快步舞！可现在……我说不好了。嗯，这下你没办法再从巡洋舰的眼皮底下逃到亚空间里了吧，你这个老王八蛋？谁会想到，我居然会参加你的葬礼呢……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德心不在焉地捋了捋头发。{/n}“是啊，是啊……换做以前，如果我亲眼看到‘油罐’躺在棺材里，我恐怕会高兴得跳起舞来，是真的跳起舞来！黄金王座在上，我会在他的葬礼上当场来一段快步舞！可现在……我说不好了。嗯，这下你没办法再从巡洋舰的眼皮底下逃到亚空间里了吧，你这个老王八蛋？谁会想到，我居然会参加你的葬礼呢……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard se pasa una mano por el pelo, distraído.{/n} «Vaya, vaya... Hubo una época en la que me habría puesto a bailar al ver a Bidones en un ataúd. ¡Literalmente! ¡Por el Trono que me habría marcado un baile ahí mismo! Pero ahora... no sé. Ya no volverás a saltar a la disformidad justo en las narices del crucero, ¿eh, viejo lobo? Quién habría imaginado que asistiría a tu funeral...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

Hubo una época en la que me habría puesto a bailar al ver a Bidones en un ataúd. ¡Literalmente! ¡Por el Trono que me habría marcado un baile ahí mismo! Pero ahora... no sé. Ya no volverás a saltar a la disformidad justo en las narices del crucero, ¿eh, viejo lobo? Quién habría imaginado que asistiría a tu funeral...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラードは気が散ったかのように手で髪の毛をたくしあげた。{/n}「いやはや…ジェリカンが棺桶に入っている姿を見るだけで小躍りできるほど嬉しくなるような時期もありました。本当ですよ！見たらその場でジグを踊っていたでしょうね。ですが、今となっては…なんとも言えません。こんな姿になっては、巡洋艦の目と鼻の先で〈歪み〉の中に飛び込むような芸当もできないな、ん？まさかお前の葬式に出ることになるとはね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードは気が散ったかのように手で髪の毛をたくしあげた。{/n}「いやはや…ジェリカンが棺桶に入っている姿を見るだけで小躍りできるほど嬉しくなるような時期もありました。本当ですよ！見たらその場でジグを踊っていたでしょうね。ですが、今となっては…なんとも言えません。こんな姿になっては、巡洋艦の目と鼻の先で〈歪み〉の中に飛び込むような芸当もできないな、ん？まさかお前の葬式に出ることになるとはね…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard streicht sich abwesend mit der Hand durch sein Haar.{/n} "Tja ... es gab eine Zeit, da hätte mich Kanisters Anblick in einem Sarg zum Tanzen gebracht. Buchstäblich! Beim Thron, ich hätte sofort einen Freudentanz aufgeführt! Aber jetzt ... ich weiß nicht. Jetzt springt Ihr nicht mehr direkt vor der Nase Eurer Feinde in den Warp, was, alter Knabe? Wer hätte gedacht, dass ich Eure Bestattung miterleben würde ...?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard streicht sich abwesend mit der Hand durch sein Haar.{/n} "Tja ... es gab eine Zeit, da hätte mich Kanisters Anblick in einem Sarg zum Tanzen gebracht. Buchstäblich! Beim Thron, ich hätte sofort einen Freudentanz aufgeführt! Aber jetzt ... ich weiß nicht. Jetzt springt Ihr nicht mehr direkt vor der Nase Eurer Feinde in den Warp, was, alter Knabe? Wer hätte gedacht, dass ich Eure Bestattung miterleben würde ...?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard se passe distraitement une main dans les cheveux.{/n} « Eh bien... À l'époque, la vue de Jerrycan dans un cercueil m'aurait fait sauter de joie. Littéralement ! Que le Trône m'en soit témoin, j'aurais dansé la gigue devant son cadavre ! Mais aujourd'hui... je ne sais pas. Alors comme ça, tu ne plongeras plus jamais dans le Warp sous le nez d'un croiseur, hein, vieille canaille ? Qui aurait pu dire que j'assisterais un jour à tes funérailles... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se passe distraitement une main dans les cheveux.{/n} « Eh bien... À l'époque, la vue de Jerrycan dans un cercueil m'aurait fait sauter de joie. Littéralement ! Que le Trône m'en soit témoin, j'aurais dansé la gigue devant son cadavre ! Mais aujourd'hui... je ne sais pas. Alors comme ça, tu ne plongeras plus jamais dans le Warp sous le nez d'un croiseur, hein, vieille canaille ? Qui aurait pu dire que j'assisterais un jour à tes funérailles... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, parmaklarını saçlarının arasında dalgın dalgın gezdiriyor.{/n} "Nereden nereye! Bir zamanlar Bidon'u tabutta uzanırken görsem keyiften göbek atardım. Abartmıyorum! Taht şahidim olsun ki oracıkta zil takıp oynardım! Ama şimdi... Bilemiyorum. Ya ihtiyar, kruvazörlerin burnunun dibinde öteboyuta atlayamaya paydos! Bir gün cenazene katılacağım kimin aklına gelirdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard distractedly runs a hand through his hair.{/n} "Well, well... There was a time when the sight of Jerrycan in a coffin would have been enough to make me dance. Quite literally! By the Throne, I would have danced a jig on the spot! But now... I don't know. No more jumping into the warp right from under the cruiser's nose, eh, you old beast? Who would've thought I'd be at your funeral..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard kafası karışmış bir biçimde parmaklarını saçlarının arasında gezdiriyor.{/n} "Nereden nereye... Bir zamanlar Bidon'u tabutta uzanırken görsem keyiften dans ederdim. Sahiden! Taht şahidim olsun ki oracıkta göbek atardım! Ama şimdi... Bilemiyorum. Artık geminin burnundan öteboyuta atlamak yok, öyle mi ihtiyar? Bir gün senin cenazene geleceğim kimin aklına gelirdi ki?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
